title: Biomedical Ontologies with Python
summary: Biomedical ontologies are large, graphical data structures that describe concepts in biology and medicine. An ongoing area of research is determining how to integrate these from different sub-domains, since they are too large to integrate by hand. This describes an elaborate approach using machine learning and distributed computing, implemented in python.
